reviews.review_msg: This man changed my life, i love him :)

I work as a biologist. If you are interested in a career in this domain, you should take this course with him (if he hasn't retired yet).  You have a lot of support and time to learn the required contests and you can consult about the lecture material as well. He is there to help you, not to get you through. That's your job. Welcome to University!
Superrr hard.. hes a nice prof nonetheless

Extremely open to helping students in lab. The lab midterm/final is very fair - everything you need to know can be found in the teaching script, so make sure you study it well. Attended 2/10 of the labs but still did fairly well on the lab exams.

Welcomes questions. I was top 15% in class. However, lab questions insanely hard. Spent hours studying but still not enough. Some questions are very tricky. they seem simple but he adds something in them that makes the answer false. Have to be VERY detailed studying to do well. know where everything comes from and where it goes. Skip lab = fail.
super hard

Lab instructor.  Insanely hard incomprehensible weird questions and not much chance to practise that kind of question.  None in actual lab. Results in unfair testing situation. Depressingly confusing, even though I did above average.

Was lab instructor, lab manual extremely important. Midterm and final extremely difficult unless you have photographic memory. Enthusiastic and helpful. Strongly encouraged to go to open labs so that it sticks in the brain, and read over teaching script over and over again while studying.
The course has a lot of info to cram into the noggin... too many  wanna be doctors in the course

All you need to do is listen in class, TAKE NOTES which he will provide on the overhead and study them! His way of teaching is simple but that's also the best part of it. His exams are straightforward! You don't have to be a rocket scientist to figure them out, cause they are directly from the notes like "copy and past".
Lab midterms are fair and is very helpful during labs.
best prof ever; great if you are interested beyond just 'whats on the exam'.  wish he taught upper division!

he is one of the best profs at sfu with out a doubt in my mind if you talk with him and ask questions (maybe read a little) you will find the class a lot easier then staying quite and leaving the lab early only to have to read everything when the test comes professor thong is definitively good FTW !!!

I really like him!! He seems to know a lot of information and explains it well and stays on topic and lets us know what is important. I dont even fall asleep in his early morning classes .. I recommend him too..
Took during summer semester. Class average was too low, and he decided to drop the lower half. Kind of unfair because the class is supposed to be scaled..
His midterm was so easy. His lab midterm was so tricky. His final was so hard. I got A-, but I studied thrice as much as the course that I got A+ from.
very good prof. excellent lab teaching scripts.
The best teacher ive had thus far.  cares for his students, and is very approachable.
course requires a lot of reading/studying of notes, lab script and a bit of the text...really helpful and explains materials and concepts really well...highly recommended =)

He is very helpful when you ask him questions. His lab exams are hard BUT if you read the lab carefully (at least once) you will do fine on them. Don't expect to get high marks if you are not studying hard.
SUPER AWESOME prof. He's really clear in his explanations and cracks jokes once in a while. His exams are tricky, but all the info is in his teach scripts.
100% notes studying
A very good instructor. Cares for his students. Very helpful. He is nice to everybody and easy to talk to.

Awesome prof! His lab manual was really thorough, and I did ok studying off it even though I hardly ever went to the labs. His exams are really picky... make sure you study every single little detail in the lab manuals.
I agree~ Dr.Thong is one of the best profs I've ever had. Take this course with his laboratory then U WILL C!

hell yes!!! Dr Thong is one of the best biology professors i've had so far...really good  notes and explanations..hahah ended up with a B+..u gotta work really hard though..esp for the lab exams.read the taping scripts and do the qns asked..^^if u want Thong as your prof..take bisc 101 is the Summer..

He is extremely helpful! If you ask questions during lab, he is really willing to help and and even though you don't need help, he comes up and explains to you further.  Very organized lab, exams, posts up most of the models and slids that you have seen in the lab.  BUT study HARD on exam because he picks every little details!!

Extremely friendly and nice. Soooo helpful and passionate about bio.  For a first year class, extensive amount of work.  Exams really hard.  I studied for 3-4 days, still feel I really knew my stuff, but got a D on the lab exam!  Need to know info INSIDE AND OUT!  MC questions written in a very tricky manner
No Comments

Impressively organized labs/lab exams! Really knowledgable and Friendly instructor. Always open to questions. Sometimes labs may seem redundant to attend lab, but Just do it because things you can only learn first-hand in lab are bound to show up on exam. Plus you always learn something interesting in lab not in the script.
He cut me a break that I will never forget about. Very bright, good teacher.

funny professor. Some labs are quite fun. But his exmas are tricky...I thought I did alright on them.;..but by looking at the result, I was shocked. But he's very helpful. Go to him and ask him if you have a quesiton. He'll gladly help you!(even when you don't ask, when you look like you need help, he will help you )
best prof ever! Thong is awesome and super helpful if you're having trouble in the lab
His labs are quite fun. Except for rat dissections. Exams are rather difficult, with tricky choices. Most people pass though, so it's not too bad. Very helpful in the lab, also some helpful TA's too
are you guys serious??? his tests were soo hard. his lectures are really easy to follow and clear but the tests are nothing like the lectures.

his tests don't measure what you actually know. i always heard him talk about the students that didn't do well. and i guess he could be helpful, but there is no point because his tests are unreasonable.  don't take this class if you dont' have to. it's only going to bring your gpa down.

Well Dr. Thong is a nice guy but the course is not easy AT ALL.  I took this class as my elective and it the biggest regret in my life! The time and effort you put in this course just don't worth it.  After all it's just a 100 level course.  Doesn't matter who's teaching it, dont' take the course unless you HAVE TO.
Yes, totally agree with what you guys said. He is really an excellent professor that I have never met in Simon Fraser University before, eventhough I am taking this course right now.
He's a good lab instructor. He'd often offer to help when he sees u might b having trouble, w/o u even asking. His lab exams r hard tho.
No Comments

Took this course 2 years ago with him and still recall clearly how helpful and polite this man was. Will take time to explain each concept. Exams are hard but taking into account his availability for questions and the fact that he gives you fair warning, they are definitely FAIR! V. nice to 1styears
awsome

This prof is one of the best I hv so far. He is very helpful and friendly. He is very nice to every ppl. If u hv anything that u don't understand, don't hesitate to ask him. He will be very happy to answer ur question.
Excellent teacher, flexible, friendly and helpful. I was sick and missed his lab test and he was very kind -- he let me remake it early in the morning before the first exam shift.
Dangerously Helpful, Never hesitate to ask him any questions!!! Amazingly AWESOME teacher, if he did the lectures BISC studies would be heaven.

I agree, one of the best profs at SFU.  He should be teaching BISC 101 instead of Dr. Palsson.  His lab exams are very tricky, though.  Read and try to memorize everything in the taping scripts and diagrams.
one of the best
AWESOME
Excellent professor! He intends for his students to learn the material. You don't even need to ask and he'll come explain certain concepts during lab.
He is friendly, easy-going, and helpful. He should be a lecture prof.
He's a very nice and approachable teacher.  He even tries to remember all of his students names.

He explains concepts on the BISC 101 Lab throughly. One of the nicest professors! He is serious in lectures, but very approachable otherwise. The lab tests were pretty tricky though. READ Lab Taping Scripts, etc. WELL!!
Great guy! very helpful, lab exam questions are just straight memorization
Good teacher...if you asked, he'd help. And he's good at explaining things.
He's super nice. He's got pretty hard exams but he's mainly trying to get you to learn how to deal with university.
good prof but hard exams
Wonderful prof!  Very approachable.  He really cares for his students' performance in the class.  Lab exams are tricky...
No Comments
Supremely patient man with a love for biology.  An excellent teacher.
nicest and most helpful professor. cool name.
GREAT prof! very helpful and very excited about biology. do follow the lab tape scripts and read the textbook
Dr. Thong is a great lab instructor, he is very clear in his explanations and willing to take time to help you, his exams are somewhat challenging but duable
cool lab instructor who knew his stuff. also very clear and helpful, way better than the TAs..just wish he taught the lecture this sem.
great prof and lab instructor!
No Comments
Good prof, fair exams, challenging though.  Enthusiastic.
He was a great lab intructor and always welcomed questions. By the end of course, i felt smarter.
DO NOT! miss any of his classes, the lecture tapes are useless. otherwise good prof if u read the text book easy A
awesome prof
No Comments
No Comments
his notes were helpful and they provided a vital role in doing well on the midterm and final but the TAs were crappy they don't know anything
very good notes easy to follow moderate exam
No Comments
what can I say?  With a name like Thong you cant go wrong...
No Comments
His lab notes are so helpful, after studying his lab notes, u dont really have to attend lectures. save time.
clear lecture, but the course it self has much memorization to do and he often ask vague questions on exam so don't just study the general topics
Very organized (ie w/ labs) and great notes - long exams though
No Comments
No Comments
Extremely helpful, but very tricky lab exams, must study hard for lecture exams
talks too fast...
All his exams are tricky and hard. Your hand should be sore after every lecture.
Very Helpful! but Lab exams are very tricky
Helpful lab taping script!  Tricky lab exams!  Ok lecture exams!
Very helpful, lab exams are very tough (watch his wordings), a very helpful prof
Writes overheads too fast, but a very good teacher.  Helpful, if asked.
No Comments
Writes notes on overhead w/ us so we're on the same page. Long labs. Hard exams.
DUDE! He's Da MAN!
my favorite prof... good lectures & very helpful
Sometimes Funny
He's great =)
No Comments
Always had time to help you out. Very long and tedious labs
very enthusiastic which is nice to see, labs are long though
loves helping others! Dr.Thong is a great person!
enthusiastic
ummm dont have much to say didnt go most of the time
Very good lecture notes, explain the contents clearly, a very helpful professor.
Hard exams but very approachable especially with remarking questions.
hard lab exams but very helpful
No Comments
Very difficult lab exams, but also very knowledgable and helpful
No Comments
Very helpful and approachable
Very helpful lab instructor for first year biology.
